text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4fdb8bd0546ac8d90560a4fad359a48667089d43|patch 8.2.0921: CTRL-W T in cmdline window causes trouble>
patch 8.2.0921: CTRL-W T in cmdline window causes trouble

Problem:    CTRL-W T in cmdline window causes trouble.
Solution:   Disallow CTRL-W T in the cmdline window.  Add more tests.
            (Naruhiko Nishino, closes #6219)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0921: CTRL-W T in cmdline window causes trouble · vim/vim@4fdb8bd

attachments.text: Problem: CTRL-W T in cmdline window causes trouble. Solution: Disallow CTRL-W T in the cmdline window. Add more tests. (Naruhiko Nishino, closes #6219)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bb861e293e0170455184079fa537278754b07911|patch 8.2.0924: cannot save and restore a register properly>
patch 8.2.0924: cannot save and restore a register properly

Problem:    Cannot save and restore a register properly.
Solution:   Add getreginfo() and make setreg() accept a dictionary. (Andy
            Massimino, closes #3370)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0924: cannot save and restore a register properly · vim/vim@bb861e2
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0924: cannot save and restore a register properly · vim/vim@bb861e2
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot save and restore a register properly. Solution: Add getreginfo() and make setreg() accept a dictionary. (Andy Massimino, closes #3370)

patch 8.2.0925: getcompletion() does not return command line arguments

Problem:    Getcompletion() does not return command line arguments.
Solution:   Add the "cmdline" option. (Shougo, closes #1140)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/df44a27b53586fccfc6a3aedc89061fdd9a515ff|patch 8.2.0928: many type casts are used for vim_strnsave()>
patch 8.2.0928: many type casts are used for vim_strnsave()

Problem:    Many type casts are used for vim_strnsave().
Solution:   Make the length argument size_t instead of int. (Ken Takata,
            closes #5633)  Remove some type casts.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0928: many type casts are used for vim_strnsave() · vim/vim@df44a27
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0928: many type casts are used for vim_strnsave() · vim/vim@df44a27
attachments.text: Problem: Many type casts are used for vim_strnsave(). Solution: Make the length argument size_t instead of int. (Ken Takata, closes #5633) Remove some type casts.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/cc613031b96f1cfa5a184253e745c26f1def9be4|patch 8.2.0929: v:register is not cleared after an operator was executed>
patch 8.2.0929: v:register is not cleared after an operator was executed

Problem:    v:register is not cleared after an operator was executed.
Solution:   Clear v:register after finishing an operator (Andy Massimino,
            closes #5305)

attachments.text: Problem: v:register is not cleared after an operator was executed. Solution: Clear v:register after finishing an operator (Andy Massimino, closes #5305)

            Add tests.
